website_summaries.verdict: Runs fast with four drying posts to give you effective results at a good price point.
pros: Contains four forced air boot drying posts that allow it to work for multiple garments
Ships with extension tubes to dry tall boots effectively
Safe for all types of materials in footwear
Can choose to run the machine with heat or without heat
cons: Tends to run a little noisy
Doesn't offer as much heat as some others

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. My main squeeze works as a truck driver in a cold climate and comes home with wet, smelly boots. The fan he used to dry them out was no longer cutting the mustard. He has warm, dry feet every morning thanks to this baby. He also wears a size 15 shoe and this accommodates his giant boots without the extensions.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren T

customer_reviews.title: Helpful with stinky teenager!
customer_reviews.text: My son plays a lot of soccer for high school and other teams. His shoes come off his feet and smell like they've visited the depths of hell. This device has helped get them dry. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my old one took 10 hours to dry my work boots. This one takes 90 minutes! It is a little cheap on the construction, but it does work very well. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone. if I had any complaints, it would be a way to block off the glove dryer so you get more air flow to the boots, make it a little more sturdy on the construction and the knob is a little hard to turn. Other than that it is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Full Throttle Repair LLC

customer_reviews.title: Works great, indispensable for me!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a rainforest. This unit was purchased to keep expensive hiking boots from staying wet all the time, which would cause premature wear. The unit performs extremely well, and the construction is noted to be of a high quality. There's nothing quite like putting on warm boots and socks before work. The timer goes to only three hours, so extremely wet, larger boots may need a timer reset or two. I'll be using this everyday, for more than one cycle, so I'll repost if anything changes. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Snoid

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to take to college. This is a necessity for athletes to prevent grotesque odors from athletic shoes! This is the second one of these (exact same machine) we have purchased; however, the knob from the first one broke off after several months of daily use. We still use the first one purchased nearly every day...using an adjustable wrench now to turn it on due to the broken knob! Ha! It really is a great machine! I’m hoping this second one stays intact longer!! I highly recommend!! My only recommendation to the company would be to make the knob stronger. The plastic knob construction is not made to last!
customer_reviews.author: FF1003

customer_reviews.title: but better in that it won't damage any materials or plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. The problem is, most people don't know what to expect. This blows warm air, not hot, SO it'll dry slower than some would think, but better in that it won't damage any materials or plastic parts on ski equipment. Really gets into the gloves to dry them out. Quiet, can run for a long time, functional timer. Recommend as a good boot/glove drier.
customer_reviews.author: Ian R. Baumel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I live in Washington and ride motocross in the summer and snowboard during the winter’s. This boot dryer is standard operating equipment! It gets my alpine stars Moto boots dry in about 30 minutes to an hour after they have been soaked inside. I’m glad that I picked the model with the heat because after I wash my boots the heat really speeds up the drive time. I am writing this review only a few days after receiving my product so I cannot vouch for the durability yet. However it looks solid and I expect it to last me for a few years hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Works great for hockey
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and dries wet gloves, boots and sports equipment. I use it primarily for my hockey gear which should be a true testament since it keeps the equipment fresh and stench way down.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fast drying your snowboard boots
customer_reviews.text: I have brought this huge dryer to my snowboard trip(I hope they can be folded for easy travel) the reason I don't bring the traveller version is the power n heat it gives It's lucky to bring this with me last time since my boots are totally soaked with heavy rain... it can dry mine and my wife's boots n gloves before next morning~ the design and power are just great~ and it is quiet even u are sleeping
customer_reviews.author: Macbrainer

customer_reviews.title: Has been a great tool to dry shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase. Have used for water soaked 8" steel toed work boots, 6" boots and washed sneakers, normal sweaty shoes, the fan is not too loud as I have it in the room where the TV is and DO NOT have to turn the volume up. Have even go to bed with unit on and cant hear it running; it cuts off automatically which is a great thing. Don't have to wonder did I forget it. would purchase again but hope I don't have too.
customer_reviews.author: tazmanianangel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Quite! It just sounds similar to a soft sounding floor fan. Does amazing for the shoes and boots I get wet on a daily basis and I actually don't dred having to go out in the rain or walking through water bc I know I can go home and dry my shoes in a timely manner. I have even washed my shoes more often bc I know they will be clean and dry when I finish. It is an amazing thing to have dry shoes.
customer_reviews.author: delaab01

customer_reviews.title: Drying
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Put the boots on the dryer apply heat if desired, set time and let it go. Boots are dry to start the day. You can tell when the dryer is running but it is not so noisy that you can't care on a normal conversation when in the same room
customer_reviews.author: FeelingGood

customer_reviews.title: versatile
customer_reviews.text: works well. Winter use for boot drying, gloves, hats etc. Use it for hats and workout/running shoes year round. Boxing gloves and other gear get super sweaty and dry in 90 min. bought a second one just for that purpose. A little loud, but that is to be expected...just run it in a room you dont need quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Dried a sopping wet pair of NRS Boundary neoprene boots in a few hours. Great way to minimize mold and smell in boots, gloves and other items like water bottles and hydration bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Dazer

customer_reviews.title: Dries my Boots & Gloves & anything else I can manage to get on it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has run quite a bit around here as I'm a down & dirty outdoors kinda Guy. It's been running going on two Winters. I keep it in the Mud Room so noise is not an issue. For folks that complained about noise, come on folks it's a fan. Most stuff I dry is pretty much good to go in one run even boots with felt liners if 1/4" is liner thickness.
customer_reviews.author: C-Rec7777

customer_reviews.title: Nice Machine
customer_reviews.text: I got this just in time for the 9" of rain we just got in Southern California.... Rare storm and I actually got it to keep shoes dry from work all day sweating to keep them from being stinky..... Then the Rain... well My shoes are dry every morning and for fun I turn it on hour before i leave and warm them up so no cold toes....Seems well made good reviews and fits in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Tiare Dream

customer_reviews.title: Best boot dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Have had the boot dryer for about two months already and I’m happy to say I am very pleased, works really well and is durable, even when I put my wet muddy, 12” tall leather boots on the dryer it still stands tall, I keep mine in the garage to keep away from the noise, other than that for the first boot dryer I’ve ever bought, in glad it was this one! And I use this daily, with no issues. Dry boots every time! Would definitely buy again, well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Julian Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Gift buyers beware!
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is functional, noise isn't too bad. However, it doesn't quite warm up like we thought the heat setting would. Also- if you are buying this as a gift, It Arrives In The Original packaging!! It is not in an unmarked box, which was really annoying when my dad picked up the box after it was delivered & he was the intended receiver -_-
customer_reviews.author: alejandra esqueda

customer_reviews.title: Wish I hadn’t waited so long!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! It’s so nice to know our boots shoes and gloves will be dry and ready to go when we need them. Good design, solid construction, seems like it will hold up. 4/5 for noise level - Just your basic whirring fan noise, it’s not particularly loud or annoying, but you can definitely tell it’s running. Would be nice to have a choice between low/silent and high/quickdry fan speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Cheese Hamlet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for keeping sport cleats dry and avoids the smells
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for keeping sport cleats dry and avoids the smells. If you have the Heat selection on it will add some heat to the room so ideal for a garage or basement setting but overall not a big deal. the timer is key though as it allows you to not have to monitor it or forget to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this thing every day for 2 and a half years and still works like new. I put my work boots on at then end of the day. The heat setting works good to dry shoes out and keep them from stinking. The fan does make some noise and it fairly loud, doesn’t bother me though. Sounds similar to a space heater fan like you would use in a small room or something.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: It works, but...
customer_reviews.text: The boot drier came quickly and well packaged. I like it, but it takes more than one cycle on the drier to fully dry anything. The timer is not able to go high enough to stay on for the amount of time required to get anything dry. I do wish the output from the unit was a bit higher too, but it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for wet cleats, sneakers, hats, bags, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Funny-looking contraption but it totally works. It's awesome for snow gear that needs to dry out, and it is really excellent all year long when your kids have wet shoes and shoes from the rain. Dries out boots, cleats, and sneakers. Caught it the rain? You can put wet gloves, baseball caps, and hats on it too. It also comes in handy when you accidentally spill liquid (coffee) in your bag or purse because you can prop your purse over it and dry it out. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: MS.NK

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my Max-Dry Heavy-Duty boot dryer from Amazon in May 2019 and the timer stopped working in September, just 4 months. One day I set the timer for 1 hour and when I got back from work after 9 hours the dryer was still running. Think hard before you buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: montegn

customer_reviews.title: Just a few hours...to dry ski boots!
customer_reviews.text: For Christmas, I purchased this machine for my son's ski boots! It runs and performs like a champ! His room is carpeted and the noise from the dryer is no louder than a small portable fan we use during the summer months in his room. Definitely a smart purchase for those who live, work or play in snow country. Take the bootliners out of the boot shell and the liners are dry within 3 hours. This has to fight growth of bacteria and prolong life of ski boots...and feet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Junk, smells when it heats up and forces very little air, sweaty boots should have dried in 6 hours on here.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Timer function doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Effective at drying shoes and gloves, provided something is on each of the 4 vents. Otherwise an open vent gets all the flow and the rest of the items are slow to dry. The timer function broke today. The product is 4 months old. Now the dial is a simple on/off switch so I have to remember to turn it off manually. Not sure I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Kari Z RN

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer cleats
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for 3 years now and love it! We use it to dry out soccer and football cleats when they are wet from sweat or playing in the rain. It won't prevent shoes from getting stinky but if they get stinky, I can wash the shoes and dry them on the dryer so they are nice and fresh! Great during the winter months when I can't put the shoes out in the hot sun in the summertime.
customer_reviews.author: N. Reiser

customer_reviews.title: For me it's great depends what you use it for
customer_reviews.text: For me it's great because I work outside in snow and rain and my gear gets wet regardless . So instead of having a bunch of different boots I can just put my soaked boots and gloves on this dryer and in just an hours time on high heat my gear is ready too wear too work the next day.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: quite nice
customer_reviews.text: I bike to work. If you get wet gloves and stay on top of keeping them dry they will last a lot longer. They wont' get the funky smell etc. This is useful and great quality, it isn't that expensive and i have gotten a lot of use out of it. Took off one start because sometimes you have to calibrate the timer a bit that is annoying but doesn't impact functionality.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I spend 12 hrs. a day on my feet in steel toes...that's a minimum. This dryer helps get some of the funk out. My boots don't smell new but they also don't smell like Swampthing wore them. The dryer isn't quiet but that's not why I bought it. The heat feature is awesome! Also, my boots are waterproof so the inside only gets damp when in snow/rain. The dryer works well to dry them out.
customer_reviews.author: Bigfleck3

customer_reviews.title: The Best Boot Dryer Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This boot dryer is 'da bomb! It is the best boot dryer I have ever used. I wear waterproof steel toe work boots 12 hours a day and normally the boots smell like a cat peed in them, even when I alternate days between 2 pair of boots. Now when I take off my shoes, I pull out the insoles, put the boots on the dryer with the insoles slid up along the uppers. One full 3 hour drying cycle later, the boots are ready for another 12 hour day! Hurray! No more cat pee odor and I can wear the same pair of boots every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Bob 'da Sparky'

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my husband as a Christmas gift. He loves it. Uses it all the time for drying boots and gloves. It has a heat selection which our other brand didn’t. This works much better. Noise level is not bad. Not bothersome at all. It is a little pricey but works much better than others out there and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: GCHASE

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I mudd my Atv every weekend. Used to take 3 days to fully dry my boots with a fan. This dries them in hours.
customer_reviews.author: J J J

customer_reviews.title: This works great. I love that you can dry gloves and ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I love that you can dry gloves and boots/shoes at the same time. It is a bit noisy, but I keep in the garage. The automatic timer shuts off after you set the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: A little loud.
customer_reviews.text: It is a well made product, a bit loud. I wish it was quieter but it is a dryer after all. Easily falls over with big heavy boots if you try to move it with them on it, but that doesnt matter to me. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!!! My husband works for the DOC and his boots were smelling up our entire apartment, and he doesn't even have smelly feet under normal circumstances, but hey when you walk around a prison complex all day, things happen. Anyway, I was thinking maybe if we put them on a dryer they might not wreak so bad. He puts his boots on it every night after work and OMG. No more stinky apartment!!! I would buy this again and again, but luckily I haven't needed to as it is pretty durable. We've had it for several months now and it is working great. LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: MaxxDry Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Made it through 1 season just fine so far. Used it mostly for gloves/mittens. With heat on it will dry them in a half hour or less.
customer_reviews.author: Keyser Soze

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useless
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to dry any faster if the dryer is on or off. I can hear the fan blowing but can't feel much air or heat. Pretty worthless. I may have a defective unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: using it every day to dry shoes
customer_reviews.text: I thought it'll be useful only for the ski boots but I'm drying all shoes now. My feet sweat a lot and this will extend the life of my shoes. I wish I would have bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: 19i@ARPuQo$3

customer_reviews.title: SO GLAD I PURCHASED THIS
customer_reviews.text: SO GLAD I PURCHASED THIS!!! Wet boots and gloves every day from school aged kids. Dries them out, and no smelly boots or gloves or wet in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not loud at all
customer_reviews.text: This boot dryer works great. Not loud at all. I would say it's quiter than a regular house fan or one of those portable heaters. It's really handy it has a timer on it so you don't have to worry about leaving it on. Timer goes all the way up to 3 hours but don't thing you would ever need it for that long even with sopping wet boots. It also has an option for heat or no heat. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet - Our son works for the railroad ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfection. Nice and quiet - Our son works for the railroad and came home with wet boots 70% of the time. Not good for foot health! This item worked beautifully to dry his boots completely and not ruin the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Quiet operation and dries very well.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet operation. Dries boots well keeping the odor to a minimum. I like the built in timer dial so the it may simply be set an forgotten until you need your boots again.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Saved my boots...and my family
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Muck boots that are my favorite. Their only flaw is how smelly they get after being worn for extended periods of time. I bought these boot dryers as a last ditch effort to fix the problem and it worked so well that I went around the house making everyone smell my boots! Would give it six stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best device ever!
customer_reviews.text: After a week of rainy soccer practices and the most horrendous smell emanating from my boys' cleats, this was recommended by a friend and has been a god send!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Torrey

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Use everyday
customer_reviews.text: Two years use. Great. Shoes are dry. I read to place bags over the glove dryer when not in use. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Works great! It's about as loud as a fan
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It's about as loud as a fan. It gets our shoes and boots dry within a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Larson

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Little bulky
customer_reviews.text: Well made but i wish they made one that was small but still had a fan. But of the 3 of these ive had its a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot dryer the only thing I don’t like is the timer wish you could turn it on and it would stay on
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves this. It dries his boots and gloves great when he gets home from work and the drying helps keep the boots from smelling.Doesnt take up as much space as i would have thought and its worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Massey

customer_reviews.title: This is a life saver for drying my son's hockey ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver for drying my son's hockey gloves and skates. It is much easier to carry around than the hockey dryer. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a true life saver this winter!! The kids always come home with soaking we gloves and the gloves are impossible to turn inside out so they can dry in the dryer! This has been worth every penny spent on it...I'm even considering buying a second one for my family of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these one for my niece and one for my nephew for their ski hose and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Heide Perry

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is a lobsterman. He dries his boots and gloves on this every night. It works great, a little noisy did we keep it in our storage area
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: A good dryer.
customer_reviews.text: Mandatory in the winter for drying boots and gloves. Also dries shoes in the wet season, or after scrubbing them. Option of heat or no heat. Might be better if you could choose to blow air on only one side, but all 4 posts get air at the same time. Can do 4 gloves if desired.
customer_reviews.author: A Mom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is a postal carrier. She loved it it! Uses when it rains it snows and it’s been great for her.
customer_reviews.author: EvT

customer_reviews.title: Junk - one of the boot drying towers broke after a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: Dries boots/socks/gloves well enough, a bit loud but not obnoxiously so. The big issue I have with it is that one of the drying towers snapped off with normal use drying tall Muck boots. For the price, would have expected something better than the thin-walled plastic and a measly 18 months of service. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fast
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit tippy for my fiance's bogs and bunny boots so we have to prop it up against the wall. Also, you need a matt underneath it for dripping snow. But it dries out things fast and has a timer on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom status

customer_reviews.title: dries boots and gloves fast and quietly
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. I like that I can warm up two pairs of boots or boots and gloves at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Romanova

customer_reviews.title: Over year since Ive bought it. I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Over year since Ive bought it. I use it about once a week in summer with rainy weather and almost every night in winter. still works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. A PIECE OF JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: Miraculously crappy piece of crap. I turned the dial on and air came out briefly, then I turned the dial to 180 minutes and it completely stopped working for no apparent reason. Now no air, no drying, nothing. It was straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis Weintraub

customer_reviews.title: For my needs to dry and warm boots, this just didn't cut it.  If you want a slow weak air blowing dryer, it might work for you.
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to take forever to dry boots and delivered little warmth but as the snow drips off them this just makes one big mess. I sent it back. Quite disappointed. YMMV. AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: KevinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cool as hell
customer_reviews.text: This truly works!!!! Love it for shoes, boots n gloves
customer_reviews.author: Deibi Quiles

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not that well compaired to others.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would work better than it does seeing how it has an air motor in it. My peet brand one works better and doesn't have a motor.
customer_reviews.author: James E Ewen

customer_reviews.title: Dry and comfortable to start my day.
customer_reviews.text: I wear mucks 12 hours a day. Before I got the Maxx dry, I tried other methods of getting my boots dry for morning with not much luck. Now not only are they dry, I can also have them nice and warm before I put them on in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: It has a cold and hot option to dry.
customer_reviews.text: This item is amazing. My husban had it before but my kid put toys in the motor so it burned. We order the same item through amazon because We know it works great. It has the option to dry with cold and hot air which is perfect for our household.
customer_reviews.author: Dalia Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Dries like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Definitely dries but need to make it the full time. Not too loud but noticeable. Don’t care either way. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: MeghanS

customer_reviews.title: Best I have tried. And by far the quietest on I have used.
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. If you have soaked leather boots it could take two full cycles to dry them completely but for normal use and your run of the mill wet feet this dries fast and it is super quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bullock

customer_reviews.title: appeared to be just what was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: was bought as a gift. sounds like it is doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband as he works outdoors and comes home with wet boots every day. This is absolutely wonderful! In three hours time, his boots are completely dry and ready for the next day!
customer_reviews.author: Shari L. Ferschneider

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to dry my boxing gloves and it works like a charm. The timer goes to a max of three hours. The dryer itself is very compact and fits in the corner without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Yeid

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, have 2 boys with cleats and gloves. Shoes can be soaking wet, and within 3 hours shoes will be completely dry. Cant say enough good things about this product, it does exactly what it is supposed to do. Also buy the requested deodorizer spray, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hamer Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We have had ours for about 3 years now. My husband uses it daily during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works well drying boots out over an 8-12 hour ...
customer_reviews.text: This works well drying boots out over an 8-12 hour period. The fan is very weak and doesn't produce much air flow. Also note that this does not come with an option for waders to be dried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Never had a similar contraption, but this works just fine
customer_reviews.author: BARRY LANCASTER

customer_reviews.title: I son in law really liked it and their whole family takes turn using it
customer_reviews.text: I son in law really liked it and their whole family takes turn using it. The other son in law did not need it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kay Siegle

customer_reviews.title: Must-have
customer_reviews.text: At our house, we use this for drying lacrosse gear, cleats, snow boots and gloves and shoes on rainy days. Works well. Quiet and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: LHM

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It works well enough. I wish the heating element was stronger though. But putting the heater upside down into my right side-up boots made my boots dry so much quicker. Even my rubber boots dried quickly.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we have purchased this product and love it! Boots and gloves are dry and warm in the morning. My husband is a fisherman, so his boots can get very wet and he truly appreciates starting the day with dry boots. Our first one lasted 7 years using it every day. Hopefully we get the same life out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Melody L. Coombs

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer
customer_reviews.text: I use this dryer multiple times weekly and it has held up well. Does a great job of drying out soaked boots and gloves
customer_reviews.author: Eddie R Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for winter
customer_reviews.text: This shoe dryer works very well. It’s not too bulky and quiet. It drives my husbands work boots quickly as well as gloves or anything else we need dried. Perfect for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Cost

product_meta.title: MaxxDry Heavy-Duty Boot, Shoe, and Glove Dryer (2 Pairs)
product_meta.description: The MaxxDry Heavy Duty Boot, Shoe, and Glove Dryer dries two pairs of boots, shoes, or gloves in about 1 hour. Use the MaxxDry Heavy Duty to safely dry sweaty ski boots, soggy gloves, or wet football cleats. The MaxxDry utilizes forced air and heats to 105-degrees F. (40.5-degrees C.) to quickly remove moisture to prevent the growth of fungus and bacteria that cause odors and deteriorates garments over time. Forced air comes from an internal fan that pushes warm air through boots, shoes, and gloves to circulate trapped moisture through and out of the garment. The MaxxDry Heavy Duty is safe to use on shoes, boots, and gloves and will not shrink or damage custom liners or delicate items. The MaxxDry Heavy Duty includes two, removable 16-inch extension tubes to handle taller boots, and 3-hour timer that shuts the unit off automatically, and a heat/no heat switch so it can be used with or without heat. Dimensions are 12 inches deep x 17 inches high (with extension tubes) x 15 inches wide. Comes with a 6-foot power cord; 1 year warranty.
feature_bullets: Forced air boot dryer, shoe dryer, and glove dryer works simultaneously on up to four garments
Heats to 105-degrees F. (40.5-degrees C.); safe for liners, clothes, and boots
Helps eliminate odors and reduce the growth of bacteria and mold
Dries most items in about 1 hour; includes removable 16-inch extension tubes for drying taller boots
6-foot power cord; heat/no heat switch; 3 hour timer; 1-year warranty
